sentences.sentence: The structures of the obtained bisphosphine monoxides have been confirmed by 31P NMR, 1H NMR, 13C NMR spectroscopy.
sentences.translation: 从而实现了一类双膦单氧化物的新合成方法。产物结构通过了31P NMR、1H NMR、13C NMR确证。

sentences.sentence: Bisphosphine monoxides, as a class of phosphorus ligands, have broad utilities in the catalysis and pharmaceuticals.
sentences.translation: 双膦单氧化物是一类在化学催化、药物研究等领域中具有广泛用途的有机膦配体。
